param.name: type
param.span: 此 可序列化的对象的 。

span.span: The of the object that this can serialize.

param.name: overrides
param.span: 一个 ，它扩展或重写 type 参数中指定类的行为。

span.span: An that extends or overrides the behavior of the class specified in the type parameter.

param.name: extraTypes
param.span: 要序列化的其他对象类型的 数组。

span.span: A array of additional object types to serialize.

param.name: root
param.span: 定义 XML 根元素属性的 。

span.span: An that defines the XML root element properties.

param.name: defaultNamespace
param.span: XML 文档中所有 XML 元素的默认命名空间。

span.span: The default namespace of all XML elements in the XML document.

param.name: location
param.span: 用于指定类型位置的路径。

span.span: The path that specifies the location of the types.

summary.span: 返回 类的一个派生类，该派生类可以将指定类型的对象序列化为 XML 文档实例，反之亦然。

span.span: Returns a derivation of the class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML document instances, and vice versa.

summary.span: 要序列化的每个对象本身可包含类的实例，此重载可使用其他类重写这些实例。

span.span: Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.

summary.span: 此重载还指定所有 XML 元素的默认命名空间和用作 XML 根元素的类。

span.span: This overload also specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements, and the class to use as the XML root element.
A derivation of the .
